Class tripleplay.ui.Style

Added Methods
Flag newFlag(boolean, boolean) Creates a boolean style identifier with the supplied properties.
 

Changed Fields
Flag ICON_CUDDLE Change in type from Style<Boolean> to Flag.
 If true, the icon is cuddled to the text, with extra space between icon and border, if false, the icon is placed next to the border with extra space between icon and label.
Flag TEXT_WRAP Change in type from Style<Boolean> to Flag.
 Whether or not to allow text to wrap.
Flag UNDERLINE Change in type from Style<Boolean> to Flag.
 Whether or not to underline text.
